photographer.name: Alex Morgan
photographer.bio: Award-winning professional photographer and cinematic videographer with over 10 years of experience. Specializing in weddings, travel, sports, and commercial photography. Based in Mumbai, serving clients across India and internationally.

equipment.name: Sony a6000
equipment.details: 24.3MP APS-C mirrorless camera, 11fps continuous shooting, 179-point autofocus system, perfect for travel and street photography

equipment.name: 16-50mm Kit Lens
equipment.details: Sony E-mount power zoom lens, compact and lightweight, ideal for versatile everyday shooting from wide-angle to portrait

equipment.name: 50mm f/1.8 Prime Lens
equipment.details: Fast prime lens with beautiful bokeh, perfect for portraits and low-light photography, excellent sharpness and color rendition

equipment.name: Sony A7 IV
equipment.details: 33MP full-frame mirrorless camera, 4K 60p video, advanced autofocus with real-time tracking, professional-grade performance

equipment.name: 50mm f/1.8 Prime Lens
equipment.details: Sony FE 50mm f/1.8 full-frame lens, compact design, exceptional image quality for portraits and general photography

equipment.name: 24-70mm f/2.8 G Master II Lens
equipment.details: Professional zoom lens, constant f/2.8 aperture, ultra-fast autofocus, weather-sealed, ideal for weddings and events

equipment.name: Digitek Tripod
equipment.details: Sturdy and reliable tripod for stable shots, adjustable height, lightweight and portable for on-location shoots

equipment.name: CEA GT240 Sony Tough Memory Card
equipment.details: 240GB high-speed SD card, UHS-I Class 10, waterproof, shockproof, and temperature resistant for reliable storage

photographer.style: My photography style blends documentary authenticity with artistic elegance. I capture genuine emotions and moments that tell your unique story. Whether it's a wedding, a travel adventure, or a commercial shoot, I bring a cinematic eye to every frame.

seo.defaultDescription: Award-winning photographer and videographer specializing in weddings, travel, sports, events, portraits, and product photography.
seo.keywords: professional photographer, cinematic videographer, wedding photography, travel photography, sports photography, event photography, portrait photography, product photography
